channel.title: [Delta] Silly question :p woodcutting
channel.description:
If my player has the woodcutting hatchet in his bag and it clicks a tree it will do the animation but with its hand? I have put the correct animations in though... Is there a way I can make it look like he is chopping with his hatchet rather than his fist?
Also because I cba to spam and create another thread:
I can log into my server once but once I have disconnected I can no longer login it just spams:
[code=java] Connection from 127.0.0.1:53727 [client-1-Jason]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 1 ms] Game saved for player Jason ClientHandler: Client Jason disconnected (127.0.0.1) Connection from 127.0.0.1:53728 [client-1-Jason]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 1 ms] [/code] and then when I restart the server and login I am at falador park xD

item.title: [Delta] Silly question :p woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @ethanhello ethanhello
item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

idk your first question

but your second, on your command promt before it spammed, does it say “BANNING HOST”
if it did just turn the server off and on

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Silly question :p woodcutting
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

If my player has the woodcutting hatchet in his bag and it clicks a tree it will do the animation but with its hand? I have put the correct animations in though… Is there a way I can make it look like he is chopping with his hatchet rather than his fist?

Also because I cba to spam and create another thread:

I can log into my server once but once I have disconnected I can no longer login it just spams:

Connection from 127.0.0.1:53727
[client-1-Jason]: Loading Process Completed  [Has powers, lag: 1 ms]
Game saved for player Jason
ClientHandler: Client Jason disconnected (127.0.0.1)
Connection from 127.0.0.1:53728
[client-1-Jason]: Loading Process Completed  [Has powers, lag: 1 ms]

and then when I restart the server and login I am at falador park xD

Read full topic
